title: Brooklyn Beckham and Nicola Peltz share MORE wedding vow renewal pics
description: BROOKLYN Beckham and Nicola Peltz have shared more stunning snaps from their wedding row renewal – after “cruelly” snubbing his parents David and Victoria. None of the Beckhams we…
content:
BROOKLYN Beckham and Nicola Peltz have shared more stunning snaps from their wedding row renewal - after "cruelly" snubbing his parents David and Victoria.

None of the Beckhams were invited to the lavish ceremony on August 2 — presided over by Nicola’s billionaire dad Nelson — and only read about it on an US website.

Budding chef and photographer Brooklyn’s original wedding with Nicola took place on Nelson’s estate in Palm Beach, Florida, with Brooklyn’s sister Harper among the bridesmaids in April 2022.

Now, opting for a repurposed dress which her mum Claudia wore when she married tycoon Nelson in 1985, the Bates Motel actress has given a further glimpse into her magical moment.

She also sported the same original £1.3million ring for her special day.

New images show her switching up her look for their afterparty, donning a baby blue bodycon gown complete with scarf detail.

She swept her dark locks into a half-up style and kept her make-up fresh and glowing.

The Lola star was seenenjoying a romantic kiss with Brooklyn before they joined their pals for a series of happy group snaps.

The Beckhams' eldest child then whipped off his jacket as he posed for a series of pictures by a pool table.

The fresh snaps came after Nicola posed topless with her mum, 70, in more behind the scenes images of their special day - and the pair declared war against the "toxic" Beckhams.

The Sun exclusively revealed David and Victoria's fears that Brooklyn has "quit" the family for good following the new ceremony.

After seeing photos of the happy couple, friends of the couple have asked: “Is the moment Brooklyn declared himself no longer a member of the Beckham family?”

The Beckham family feud has now rumbled on for four years — before Brooklyn, 26, and Nicola, 30, originally got married in 2022, The Sun can reveal.

Last night a source said: “This was the final kick in the teeth for David and Victoria.

“Seeing Nelson having such a pivotal role at the ceremony was heartbreaking for David especially. Not one member of the 30-plus extended family knew about the wedding, or were invited.

“His grandparents are devastated too as Brooklyn has always been so close to them.

“At the original wedding, for example, Liberty - the daughter of Victoria’s sister, Louise — was a bridesmaid but even she has been cut off now. The rift runs far deeper than people realise.

“It feels cruel and spiteful. This is no longer a game. It has gone beyond all that.

“This is a family who feel they have lost their precious boy - and see no way back.

Honestly, they are now questioning why he even wants to keep the ‘Beckham’ surname - will he revert to Peltz?

"August 2nd 2025 - is this the day Brooklyn formally declared himself no longer a part of the Beckham family?"

Recently, The Sun exclusively revealed how Brooklyn and Nicola will not feature in fashion designer Victoria's upcoming documentary.

The Spice Girl singer's long-awaited Netflix programme is due for release in October.

It is understood she will not touch on the simmering feud - although she has promised there will be “tears” in the four-parter.
summary: Brooklyn Beckham and Nicola Peltz have shared more intimate photos from their wedding row renewal, after "cruelly" snubbing his parents David and Victoria Beckham. None of the Beckhams were invited to the lavish ceremony on August 2, which was presided over by Nicola's billionaire dad Nelson, and only read about it on an US website. The images reveal Nicola's repurposed wedding dress and £1.3m ring were worn by her mother Claudia when she married Nelson in 1985. The Beckham family feud has now been ongoing for four years, with friends asking if Brooklyn has officially declared himself no longer a part of the family.
shortSummary: Brooklyn Beckham and Nicola Peltz shared photos of their wedding renewal, amid a feud involving David and Victoria Beckham, where neither of them attended.

The ceremony, held on August 2, was presided over by Nicola's father, and the Beckhams learned about it through media reports. This event has intensified the ongoing family feud, with sources indicating that David and Victoria feel heartbroken and question Brooklyn's ties to the Beckham name.
